Title: Xaml Localization Tool
Description:
Xaml Localization Tool, a extension for vs2010. Help to generate .resx files from xaml. So you can use it in any application contain xaml, such as silverlight application, windows phone application and wpf application.

Xaml本地化工具, vs2010的一个插件. 可以帮助你轻松从xaml中提取你要进行多语言化的数据,因此适用于包含需要本地化xaml文件的项目，诸如silverlight项目、windows phone 项目、WPF项目。
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Xaml Localization Tool, a extension for vs2010. Help to localize xaml application, and generate .resx files from xaml. So you can use it in any application contain xaml, such as WPF application, silverlight application and windows phone application.

It's easy to use it.As "Generate Local Resources" in localize .aspx page,just open xaml,and click "Generate",it will generate .resx file contain language data from xaml.

Xaml本地化工具, vs2010的一个插件. 可以帮助你轻松本地化包含xaml文件的程序, 并从xaml中提取你要进行多语言化的数据, 因此适用于包含需要本地化xaml文件的项目, 诸如WPF项目、silverlight 项目, 甚至是windows phone项目！

用起来非常简单，就和在VS中为aspx页面添加多语言一样，打开xaml，点击生成，多语言的resource文件就被从xaml中提取出来了。

Required:VS2010.
TagList: xaml,localization,globalization,localize,ResX Generator,多语言化silverlight,本地化silverlight,提取并生成多语言资源文件,globalize,multi-language,WPF,Silverlight,Windows Phone,
